title: Linter meta-information
description: The schema of linter meta-information that extends package

package.title: Package
package.description: The package unique identifier in URI form which points to current version of package file

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: The list of supported extensions, by default corresponding extensions for linter languages are used

configs.title: Configuration files
configs.description: List of file names or masks which could be treated as linter configuration file
